headline: PWRmicro Launch and Smart Integration Could Be a Game Changer for Generac Holdings (GNRC)
summary: Generac Holdings Inc. recently unveiled the PWRmicro, an 820W microinverter that optimizes solar panel energy conversion and integrates with the company's existing clean energy solutions. The integration of PWRmicro with the ecobee app allows homeowners to manage both their clean energy systems and smart thermostats from a single platform, highlighting a move toward unified home energy management. We'll consider how PWRmicro's enhanced integration with smart-home technology could influence...
